description.para: Inserts the Unicode characters of specified size into current buffer at specified position.

param_note.para: Pointer to the data to be inserted.
Offset from the start of the EzWCharBuf object buffer, whose scope is from 0 to the length of Unicode characters in the buffer.
The number of the Unicode characters to be inserted.

return.para: Returns the actual number of the Unicode character if inserted successfully. If the parameter offset is less than 0 or greater than the length of the Unicode characters in the buffer, then it fails to be inserted and returns 0.

remarks.para: If the total length of Unicode characters inserted exceeds the maximum capacity of current EzWCharBuf object buffer, then the extra portion is truncated.
If parameter p is 0, i.e. the pointer to the data is NULL, while parameter n is not 0 and the number of the Unicode characters is not 0,then the program goes awry.
